user_query: My company is organizing a team-building retreat and we're looking for engaging hobbies to include in the itinerary. Can you recommend some hobbies from the general category that promote teamwork and collaboration? Additionally, it would be great to know the net worth of successful celebrities who have achieved great results through teamwork. Could you provide me with this information?

TaskList.description: Research and gather a list of engaging hobbies that promote teamwork and collaboration suitable for a team-building retreat.
Compile the results of successful celebrities known for teamwork and collaboration and retrieve their net worth.
Create a comprehensive itinerary integrating the selected hobbies and the net worth information of celebrities to present to the company.
